Basement Lowering Toronto

Transform Low Ceilings into Valuable Living Space

Expert basement lowering in Toronto. Convert 6-foot crawlspaces into full-height basements. Underpinning and benching options. Licensed engineers, lifetime warranty. Free consultation. Call (437) 545-0067.

  • Licensed structural engineers
  • Full underpinning service
  • Add valuable living space
  • Lifetime warranty

Professional Basement Lowering Toronto

Transform your low-ceiling basement into valuable living space

Convert your 6-foot crawlspace into a full-height basement with our professional underpinning services. Our licensed engineers and experienced contractors provide complete basement lowering solutions that add significant value to your Toronto home while creating usable living space.

Basement Lowering Investment

Transform your basement with professional lowering services:

  • Add $150,000-300,000 to your home's value
  • Create 600-1200 sq ft of usable living space
  • Enable legal basement apartment rentals
  • Licensed engineers and structural guarantees

Free Engineering Consultation: (437) 545-0067

Transform Your Basement Today

Professional basement lowering with licensed engineers

Don't let a low ceiling limit your home's potential. Our basement lowering experts can transform your cramped crawlspace into valuable living space.

Our Process

We follow a proven approach to ensure the best results

1

Structural Assessment

Licensed engineers evaluate basement lowering feasibility

2

Permits & Engineering

Handle all City of Toronto permits and structural drawings

3

Underpinning Process

Systematic excavation and foundation lowering

4

Complete Finishing

New floors, waterproofing, and basement completion
